title: Support The Presidential Accountability Act
description: Call your House rep & party leadership to register your support for Katherine Clark's bill

scripts.text: I'm [name], a constituent calling about H.R. 6340, Rep. Katherine Clark's Presidential Accountability Act. Please ask [repName] to support this resolution. The American people deserve a president who does not have any actual or perceived conflicts of interest in his financial dealings.

scripts.title: Regarding The Presidential Accountability Act
scripts.text: I'm [name], a constituent contacting you about H.R. 6340, Rep. Katherine Clark's Presidential Accountability Act. Please support this resolution. The American people deserve a president who does not have any actual or perceived conflicts of interest in his financial dealings.

notes: Learn more about the resolution here: https://www.congress.gov/bill/114th-congress/house-bill/6340/all-actions?overview=closed#tabs http://katherineclark.house.gov/index.cfm/2016/11/clark-introduces-bill-to-ensure-president-elect-addresses-conflicts-of-interest. If you have time, you could call Congresswoman Clark's office and thank her: "I'm calling to thank Congresswoman Clark for introducing H.R. 6340! I appreciate her willingness to keep the president accountable to the American people."
